const browser = await puppeteer.launch({ headless: true, }); const newDataArr = sourceDataArr.map(async (sourceData) => { const targetURL = img_url + sourceData.movieCd; const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto(targetURL); await page.waitForSelector( "#ui-id-1 > div > div.item_tab.basic > div.ovf.info.info1 > a" ); const $ = load(await page.content()); const newData: NewMovieData = { ...sourceData, img: "https://kobis.or.kr/" + $( "#ui-id-1 > div > div.item_tab.basic > div.ovf.info.info1 > a" ).attr("href"), }; page.close(); return newData; }); });
